properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster_id
properties.description: Cluster ID (default: test-cluster)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.store
properties.description: Store type: MEMORY|FILE (default: MEMORY)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.dir
properties.description: For FILE store type, this is the root directory

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.max_channels
properties.description: Max number of channels (0 for unlimited)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.max_subs
properties.description: Max number of subscriptions per channel (0 for unlimited)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.max_msgs
properties.description: Max number of messages per channel (0 for unlimited)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.max_bytes
properties.description: Max messages total size per channel (0 for unlimited)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.max_age
properties.description: Max duration a message can be stored ("0s" for unlimited)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.max_inactivity
properties.description: Max inactivity (no new message, no subscription) after which a channel can be garbage collected (0 for unlimited)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.nats_server
properties.description: Connect to this external NATS Server URL (default otherwise)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.stan_config
properties.description: Streaming server configuration file

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.hb_interval
properties.description: Interval at which server sends heartbeat to a client

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.hb_timeout
properties.description: How long server waits for a heartbeat response

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.hb_fail_count
properties.description: Number of failed heartbeats before server closes the client connection

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.ft_group
properties.description: Name of the FT Group. A group can be 2 or more servers with a single active server and all sharing the same datastore.

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.signal
properties.description: [SIGNAL] Send signal to nats-streaming-server process (stop, quit, reopen)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.encrypt
properties.description: Specify if server should use encryption at rest

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.encryption_cipher
properties.description: Cipher to use for encryption. Currently support AES and CHAHA (ChaChaPoly). Defaults to AES

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.encryption_key
properties.description: Encryption Key. It is recommended to specify it through the NATS_STREAMING_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable instead

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.replace_durable
properties.description: Replace the existing durable subscription instead of reporting a duplicate durable error

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.clustered
properties.description: Run the server in a clustered configuration (default: false)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster_node_id
properties.description: ID of the node within the cluster

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster_bootstrap
properties.description: Bootstrap the cluster if there is no existing state by electing self as leader (default: false)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster_peers
properties.description: List of cluster peer node IDs to bootstrap cluster state.

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster_log_path
properties.description: Directory to store log replication data

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster_log_cache_size
properties.description: Number of log entries to cache in memory to reduce disk IO (default: 512)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster_log_snapshots
properties.description: Number of log snapshots to retain (default: 2)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster_trailing_logs
properties.description: Number of log entries to leave after a snapshot and compaction

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster_sync
properties.description: Do a file sync after every write to the replication log and message store

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster_raft_logging
properties.description: Enable logging from the Raft library (disabled by default)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster_allow_add_remove_node
properties.description: Enable the ability to send NATS requests to the leader to add/remove cluster

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_compact_enabled
properties.description: Enable file compaction

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_compact_frag
properties.description: File fragmentation threshold for compaction

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_compact_interval
properties.description: Minimum interval (in seconds) between file compactions

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_compact_min_size
properties.description: Minimum file size for compaction

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_buffer_size
properties.description: File buffer size (in bytes)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_crc
properties.description: Enable file CRC-32 checksum

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_crc_poly
properties.description: Polynomial used to make the table used for CRC-32 checksum

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_sync
properties.description: Enable File.Sync on Flush

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_slice_max_msgs
properties.description: Maximum number of messages per file slice (subject to channel limits)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_slice_max_bytes
properties.description: Maximum file slice size - including index file (subject to channel limits)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_slice_max_age
properties.description: Maximum file slice duration starting when the first message is stored (subject to channel limits)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_slice_archive_script
properties.description: Path to script to use if you want to archive a file slice being removed

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_fds_limit
properties.description: Store will try to use no more file descriptors than this given limit

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_parallel_recovery
properties.description: On startup, number of channels that can be recovered in parallel

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_truncate_bad_eof
properties.description: Truncate files for which there is an unexpected EOF on recovery, dataloss may occur

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_read_buffer_size
properties.description: Size of messages read ahead buffer (0 to disable)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.file_auto_sync
properties.description: Interval at which the store should be automatically flushed and sync'ed on disk (<= 0 to disable)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.sql_driver
properties.description: Name of the SQL Driver ("mysql" or "postgres")

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.sql_source
properties.description: Datasource used when opening an SQL connection to the database

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.sql_no_caching
properties.description: Enable/Disable caching for improved performance

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.sql_max_open_conns
properties.description: Maximum number of opened connections to the database

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.sql_bulk_insert_limit
properties.description: Maximum number of messages stored with a single SQL "INSERT" statement

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.secure
properties.description: Use a TLS connection to the NATS server without verification; weaker than specifying certificates.

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.tls_client_key
properties.description: Client key for the streaming server

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.tls_client_cert
properties.description: Client certificate for the streaming server

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.tls_client_cacert
properties.description: Client certificate CA for the streaming server

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.stan_debug
properties.description: Enable STAN debugging output

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.stan_trace
properties.description: Trace the raw STAN protocol

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.addr
properties.description: Bind to host address (default: 0.0.0.0)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.port
properties.description: Use port for clients (default: 4222)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.pid
properties.description: File to store PID

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.http_port
properties.description: Use port for http monitoring

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.https_port
properties.description: Use port for https monitoring

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.config
properties.description: Configuration file

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.log
properties.description: File to redirect log output

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.logtime
properties.description: Timestamp log entries (default: true)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.syslog
properties.description: Enable syslog as log method

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.syslog_name
properties.description: On Windows, when running several servers as a service, use this name for the event source

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.remote_syslog
properties.description: Syslog server addr (udp://localhost:514)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.debug
properties.description: Enable debugging output

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.trace
properties.description: Trace the raw protocol

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.user
properties.description: User required for connections

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.pass
properties.description: Password required for connections

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.auth
properties.description: Authorization token required for connections

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.tls
properties.description: Enable TLS, do not verify clients (default: false)

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.tlscert
properties.description: Server certificate file

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.tlskey
properties.description: Private key for server certificate

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.tlsverify
properties.description: Enable TLS, verify client certificates

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.tlscacert
properties.description: Client certificate CA for verification

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.routes
properties.description: Routes to solicit and connect

properties.name: nats.streaming.server.cluster
properties.description: Cluster URL for solicited routes

properties.name: nats.streaming.source.arm
properties.description: ARM SOURCE URL

properties.name: nats.streaming.source.linux
properties.description: LINUX SOURCE URL

properties.name: nats.streaming.source.mac
properties.description: MAC SOURCE URL

properties.name: nats.streaming.source.windows
properties.description: WINDOWS SOURCE URL

properties.name: nats.streaming.source.solaris
properties.description: SOLARIS SOURCE URL

properties.name: nats.streaming.source.default
properties.description: DEFAULT SOURCE URL
